price: 23. Dheh: (Alle) waa Kan idin uumay idiinna yeelay maqalka, aragga iyo laabaha. Yaraa intaad (ku) mahdisaan.
arabic: قُلۡ هُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنشَأَكُمۡ وَجَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمۡعَ وَٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرَ وَٱلۡأَفۡـِٔدَةَۚ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qul huwa alladhī ansha-akum wajaʿala lakumu al-samʿa wal-abṣāra wal-afidata qalīlan mā tashkurūna
